summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Phinney Avenue, from North 50th Street to North 67th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of a street lighting system, widening roadway, paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8624 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
